member.name: M:TRNRTL10.InterfaceLogAssessor.Parse(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Looks for a named attribute in an XElement and returns its value and its translation
member.returns: Keyname and the value of the attribute in a InterfaceData structure. Returns nothing if the Fieldname cannot be found

member.name: T:TRNRTL10.InterfaceLogAssessor
member.summary: Used to parse an XML document using linq and return the settings of two fields This replaces the need to parse XML on the server as part of pAuditLogInsert

member.name: M:TRNRTL10.Transport.AdjustOutputParameterValue(System.Data.IDbDataParameter)
member.summary: Change type specific output parameter data into strings suitable for the output XML

member.name: P:TRNRTL10.Transport.ConnectionString
member.summary: Get the connection string from config This is obtained from the config file which will either be the app.config or web.config asociated with the application, or if no entry is found there it will be from the App.config file associated with the assemmbly

member.name: M:TRNRTL10.Transport.CreateSessionIDParameter(System.Data.IDbCommand,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.param: Determines whether the parameter is named SessionID or CurrentSessionID
